page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: The area is rural with one village (Singleton) and one hamlet (West Dean).The land is a mixture of grazing and forestry. MAIN FEATURES The Trundle,although not in the area,gives a good view of the district. Singleton and West Dean both lie on the busy A286 which connects Chichester with the North. West Dean College offers courses in further education. West Dean Gardens are open to the public and famous for their trees. The Open Air Museum,probably the areas major attraction contains numerous historical buildings. Chilsdown Vineyard produces white wine of local fame.
